mapper.select:
SELECT review_code, cust_id, product_code, rating, review_content, review_date, helpful_count,
product_name FROM review WHERE product_code = ${product_code} order by review_date asc
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET helpful_count = helpful_count + 1 WHERE review_code = #{review_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (cust_id, product_code, rating, review_content, review_date, helpful_count, product_name) VALUES (#{cust_id}, #{product_code}, #{rating}, #{content}, now(), 0, #{product_name})
